taxon.author: Millidge, 1991
taxon.distribution: Marshall Is., Caroline Is., Cook Is., Fiji, Samoa, French Polynesia. Introduced to Seychelles

referenceObject.reference: Beatty, J. A., Berry, J. W. & Millidge, A. F. (1991). The linyphiid spiders of Micronesia and Polynesia, with notes on distributions and habitats. Bulletin of the British Arachnological Society 8: 265-274.
